tools.description: Create a Google Doc (optionally with text content). Step 1 of doc creation - use docs_format after to apply formatting.

content.description: Optional text content to import into the doc

tools.name: docs_format

operations.description: List of formatting operations to apply

type.description: Operation type: style_text, paragraph_style, bullets, replace_text, insert_text

match.description: Text to match for applying the operation

named_style_type.description: For paragraph_style: TITLE, HEADING_1, HEADING_2, HEADING_3, NORMAL_TEXT

alignment.description: For paragraph_style: START, CENTER, END, JUSTIFIED
